page.title: 12Spare Time in Lostock
page.content:
I enjoy my spare time after school. I do all kinds of things. Sometimes my {friend rings}me up and asks me to come and play, so I do.
I also enjoy watching T.V. My favourite programme is{"Cover Up". At the weekend or in school holidays we go on{day trips}out somewhere, but this is usually during the holidays. We{go away on holiday}sometimes for a week or two. I sometimes{bake cakes}with my Mum. I mix the mixture and put it on the baking tray and my Mum puts the tray in the oven.
I used to go{swimming}at my friend's house. She used to live at the bottom of our road but she has moved. Her pool was indoors and it was heated and the pool had a slide.
